cause.description:
Because we need his charisma, leadership, and eyebrows, and that those responsible for the illegal actions taken in the Iran-Contra scandal need to be held accountable.
1. That the Regan administration should be held accountable for Iran-Contra
2. That capital punishment is abhorrent and should be banned
3. And that Michael Dukakis needs to be our next president
cause.mission: Get Michael Dukakis in the White House where he belongs.
cause.name: Dukakis for president
